title: Android 11 update - issues
content:
Hello!

Since updating my Pixel 4 to Android 11 I'm experiencing a few issues:

1. My phone won't connect to mobile data
2. My Bluetooth disconnects
3. The lower part of my screen isn't working
4. I don't receive any notifications at all, not even calls

Help!

If I need to factory reset, what's the best way to prepare for this? Will it wipe my phone? Do I need to back everything up? 

Thanks
